scripts.clean: find ./ -type d -name '.turbo' -o -name 'dist' -o -name 'storybook-static' -o -name 'node_modules' | xargs rm -rf && find ./ -type f -name '*.tsbuildinfo' | xargs rm -f
scripts.reset: pnpm clean && pnpm install && pnpm build
scripts.hooks:pub: pnpm hooks:build && cd apps/hooks && (npm version patch || true) && npm publish --access=public
scripts.ut:pub: pnpm ut:build && cd apps/utils && (npm version patch || true) && npm publish --access=public
scripts.in:pub: pnpm in:build && cd apps/internal-ui && (npm version patch || true) && npm publish --access=public
scripts.pt:pub: cd packages/prettier-config && (npm version patch || true) && npm publish --access=public
scripts.lint:pub: cd packages/eslint-config && (npm version patch || true) && npm publish --access=public
